description: This is a dataset of trademarks registered with the Colorado Secretary of State. A trademark is any word, name, symbol, or device, or any combination used to identify and distinguish goods or services.

metadata.attribution: SOS - Secretary of State - business division
metadata.description: This is a dataset of trademarks filed with the Secretary of State.  Trademarks are recognizable signs, designs or expressions (including words, names, symbols, devices or any combination) that uniquely distinguish products or services from one amongst others.  A trademark is any used to identify and distinguish goods or services.

name: Colorado Trademarks
